testMachine.Catchphrase: Test your electronic product at your fingertips
testMachine.text: During my work-study placement at Exceenis, I had the opportunity to design software for a robotic arm used to test various electronic products. My role included creating a graphic charter and integrating 3D models into an interactive scene.

madamePee.text: During my work-study experience at Exceenis, I developed a website listing all female urinals in France. My job was to design and implement this platform, meeting the specific needs of the market with precision and reliability.

bolk.Catchphrase: Good food for a healthy body
bolk.text: During my work-study experience at Exceenis, I was tasked with designing an interface for an order terminal. This involved creating a custom design, including the choice of colours and typography.
